statements: SELECT * FROM QuoteData WHERE coverage_option = 'Basic'
SELECT quote_id, coverage_option FROM QuoteData WHERE pricing_details > 100
SELECT * FROM QuoteData WHERE discount < 0.1 ORDER BY quote_id DESC
SELECT coverage_option, pricing_details, discount FROM QuoteData WHERE coverage_option = 'Standard'
SELECT quote_id, pricing_details, discount FROM QuoteData ORDER BY pricing_details ASC
SELECT * FROM QuoteData WHERE coverage_option = 'Comprehensive' AND pricing_details > 500 AND discount < 0.1 ORDER BY pricing_details DESC;
SELECT quote_id, pricing_details FROM QuoteData WHERE discount > 0.05 ORDER BY discount ASC;
SELECT * FROM QuoteData WHERE coverage_option LIKE '%Third Party%' AND pricing_details BETWEEN 200 AND 500;
SELECT quote_id, pricing_details, discount FROM QuoteData WHERE coverage_option = 'Basic' AND pricing_details <= 400 ORDER BY discount DESC, pricing_details ASC;
SELECT MAX(pricing_details), MIN(discount) FROM QuoteData WHERE coverage_option = 'Comprehensive';
SELECT * FROM QuoteData;
SELECT quote_id, pricing_details FROM QuoteData ORDER BY pricing_details DESC;
SELECT coverage_option, pricing_details FROM QuoteData WHERE pricing_details > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM CustomerData;
SELECT customer_id, customer_address FROM CustomerData WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM QuoteData WHERE discount > 0.5 ORDER BY quote_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM CustomerData WHERE LENGTH(customer_name) > 10;
SELECT * FROM QuoteData WHERE coverage_option LIKE 'Comprehensive%';
SELECT AVG(pricing_details) AS avg_pricing FROM QuoteData;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_address FROM CustomerData ORDER BY customer_name, customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM coverage_options ORDER BY coverage_name DESC;
SELECT coverage_name, coverage_description FROM coverage_options WHERE coverage_option_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM pricing_details WHERE base_price > 100 AND discount_amount <= 50 ORDER BY price_id ASC;
SELECT coverage_option_id, final_price FROM pricing_details WHERE final_price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY final_price DESC;
SELECT discount_name, discount_percentage FROM discounts WHERE discount_percentage >= 10 ORDER BY discount_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM coverage_options;
SELECT coverage_name, coverage_description FROM coverage_options ORDER BY coverage_name ASC;
SELECT coverage_name, base_price, final_price FROM pricing_details WHERE base_price > 100 ORDER BY final_price DESC;
SELECT c.coverage_name, d.discount_name, d.discount_percentage FROM coverage_options c JOIN discounts d ON c.coverage_option_id = d.discount_id;

SELECT c.coverage_name, p.final_price, d.discount_percentage FROM coverage_options c LEFT JOIN pricing_details p ON c.coverage_option_id = p.coverage_option_id LEFT JOIN discounts d ON c.coverage_option_id = d.discount_id;
SELECT * FROM coverage_options;
SELECT coverage_name, coverage_description FROM coverage_options ORDER BY coverage_name ASC;
SELECT coverage_name, coverage_description FROM coverage_options WHERE coverage_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM pricing_details WHERE base_price > 1000 ORDER BY discount DESC;
SELECT COVERAGE_ID, COVERAGE_NAME, COVERAGE_DESCRIPTION FROM coverage_options WHERE coverage_name LIKE '%auto%';
SELECT * FROM coverage_options;
SELECT coverage_id, coverage_name FROM coverage_options WHERE coverage_id = 1;
SELECT pricing_details.coverage_id, coverage_name, base_price FROM pricing_details JOIN coverage_options ON pricing_details.coverage_id = coverage_options.coverage_id;

SELECT insurance_quotes.customer_id, coverage_name, final_price AS total_price FROM insurance_quotes JOIN coverage_options ON insurance_quotes.coverage_id = coverage_options.coverage_id WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM pricing_details WHERE discount > 0 ORDER BY base_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM coverage_options;
SELECT coverage_id, coverage_type FROM coverage_options WHERE coverage_id = 1;
SELECT coverage_id, coverage_description FROM coverage_options ORDER BY coverage_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_phone LIKE '%555%';
SELECT quote_id, total_price FROM pricing_details WHERE base_price > 1000;
SELECT * FROM coverage_options;
SELECT coverage_type, coverage_description FROM coverage_options WHERE coverage_id = 1;
SELECT DISTINCT coverage_type FROM coverage_options ORDER BY coverage_type DESC;
SELECT * FROM pricing_details WHERE base_price > 100 AND total_price < 500;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_phone FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
